description: Accessibility metadata extracted from fundamental-styles story examples

globalGuidelines.focusIndicator: All interactive elements must have visible focus indicator
globalGuidelines.colorContrast: Use theme tokens which ensure WCAG AA contrast ratios
globalGuidelines.semanticHtml: Use semantic HTML elements when available (button, input, etc.)
globalGuidelines.labelRequired: All form inputs need associated labels or aria-label
globalGuidelines.liveRegions: Use aria-live for dynamic content updates
globalGuidelines.highContrastThemes: Use sap_horizon_hcb/hcw for high contrast mode

disabledState.note: Use both disabled attribute AND aria-disabled for full support

errorState.note: Link input to error message with aria-describedby

selectedItem.note: Use on list items, tabs, tree items

decorativeIcon.note: Hide icons that don't convey information
